name: War Risks Insurance Continuance Ordinance, 1969
tagline: Providing for the continuance of the War Risks Insurance Fund and its provisions.
content:
Page 1 of 2 
   
 
 
THE WAR RISK S INSURANCE CONTINUANCE ORDINANCE, 
1969  
  
CONTENTS  
1.  Short title, extent and commencement  
2.  Continuance of War Risks Insurance Fund  
 

 
Page 2 of 2 
 THE WAR RISK S INSURANCE CONTINUANCE ORDINANCE, 1969  
 
ORDINANCE NO. V OF 1969  
          
         [16th February, 1969]  
 
AN 
 
 ORDINANCE  
 
to provide for the continuance of the War Risks Insurance Fund established under the War Risk 
Insurance Ordinance, 1965, and of the provisions of that Ordinance relating to the Fund.  
            WHEREAS i t is expedient to provide for the continuance of the War Risks Insurance Fund 
established under the War Risks Insurance Ordinance, 1965, and of the provisions of that Ordinance 
relating to the Fund;  
            AND WHEREAS the National Assembly is not in s ession and the President is satisfied that 
circumstances exist which render immediate legislation necessary;       
 NOW, THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers conferred by Article 29 of the Constitution, 
and of all other powers enabling him in that behalf, t he President is pleased to make and pro mulgate 
the following Ordinance :___ 
 1. Short title, extent and commencement. ___(1) This Ordinance may be called the War 
Risks Insurance Continuance Ordinance, 1969.   
 (2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.  
 (3) It shall come into force on the day on which the War Risks Insurance Ordinance, 1965 
(XXVI of 1965), ceases to have effect under clause (7) of Article 30 the Constitution.  
 2. Continuance of War Risks Insurance Fund. â€”Notwithstanding the War Risk Insurance 
Ordinance, 1965(XXVI of 1965), hereinafter referred to as the said Ordinance, ceasing to have 
effect,___  
(a)  the War Risks Insurance Fund established thereunder shall continue and all 
sums which were required to be paid into, and all liabilities which were  
required to be discharged and all sums required to be paid out of , that Fund 
immediately before the commencement of this Ordinance shall be so paid and 
discharged, and   
(b)  the provisions of sectio ns 2 to 13, 15, 17, 20 and 22 to 27 of the said 
Ordinance  is so far as those relate to the liabilities incurred before the 
commencement of this Ordinance , all appointments made, and so much of any 
Scheme, rule, order, notification or other instrument made thereunder in force 
immediately before such commencement as relates to the War Risks Insurance 
Fund or the liabilities so incurred, shall continue in force.    
 
 RGN Dated: - 1.4.2024
